faq_questions: (For advertising, clothing, cross-site sales, social media services, artistic and music production, platform management, and professional video services.)

faq.a1: CloudWav Production is a digital platform that provides professional services including advertising, clothing, sales through other websites, social media services, artistic and music production, platform management, and professional video services. We offer comprehensive solutions for individuals and businesses to enhance their digital presence and achieve their creative and commercial goals.
faq.q2: How can I create an account on the website?
a2: Click the 'Sign Up' button on the homepage.
Enter your basic information such as email and password.
Choose the account type (Rising Artist, Famous Artist, Regular User).
Agree to the Terms and Conditions.
Verify your account via the confirmation email sent to you.
After registration, you can manage your profile, request services, and interact with available content on the platform.
faq.q3: How does the artist account work on the platform?
a3: The artist account allows you to
Upload and manage your songs on digital streaming platforms.
Receive musical and artistic support and production based on available plans.
Offer paid video services such as advertisements and dedications.
Receive event and concert offers through the website.
faq.q4: How can I request a dedication video or advertisement from an artist?
a4: Browse the list of available artists in the 'Paid Videos' section.
Select the artist you wish to request a video from.
Choose the type of video (Advertisement, Personal Dedication, Greeting, Product Promotion).
Add the required details such as name, message, and specific instructions.
Complete the payment process, and your request will be fulfilled within the specified time.
faq.q5: Can I book an artist for an event or occasion?
a5: Browse the list of available artists for events.
Select the type of event (Wedding, Festival, Private Party, Commercial Advertisement).
Submit a booking request including the location, date, and required technical details.
You will be contacted to confirm availability and finalize the pricing.
faq.q6: How can I benefit from artistic and music production services?
a6: Select the 'Artistic Production' service from the main menu.
Choose the type of work required (Song, Music Video, Editing, Music Distribution).
Submit project details such as music style, lyrics, budget, and required quality.
You will be connected with the best production teams to execute your project to the highest standards.
faq.q7: How do social media services and platform management work?
a7: Complete social media account management (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, YouTube).
Performance analysis and strategy development to increase engagement and audience reach.
Paid advertisements to increase views and followers through professional methods.
Content protection and digital rights management to prevent copyright infringements.
faq.q8: How can I pay for services?
a8: All transactions are processed through encrypted payment systems to ensure full security.
faq.q9: Can I get a refund after purchasing a service?
a9: All payments are final and non-refundable after accepting the terms and conditions of each service.
Refunds are only possible in the following cases:
The requested service is unavailable or could not be completed due to a technical or administrative issue.
Special humanitarian cases, which are evaluated by the management at its discretion.
faq.q10: How can I sign a contract with CloudWav Production as an artist?
a10: Fill out the application form on the website.
Submit your personal information and previous works.
Your application will be reviewed, and you will be contacted regarding the contract.
Upon approval, a suitable contract will be signed to define the provided services and privileges.
faq.q11: How can I contact customer support?
a11: The support team is available to assist you as quickly as possible.
faq.q12: What happens if my account gets suspended?
a12: Your account may be suspended if you violate the Terms of Use or if suspicious activity is detected.
Users can submit an appeal request through customer support for review.
CloudWav Production reserves the right to suspend or delete violating accounts without prior notice.

tipsh: * Tips for using CloudWav Production professionally:
tips: Always check the email associated with your account for important updates.
Utilize music production services, paid videos, and social media management to maximize your project's success.
If you have additional inquiries, do not hesitate to contact our support team.
legal_warning: Violating any platform policies may result in account suspension or permanent closure.
All payments are subject to a non-refund policy except for the cases mentioned in the refund policy.
CloudWav Production reserves the right to modify policies and terms according to its operational and legal needs.
not_found: Didn't find your answer here? Contact us at support@cloudwavproduction.com, and we'll be happy to assist you!

servisespage.title: Social Media Specialist
servisespage.description: Here is the reality: having a strong Social Media presence is essential for Whether you are managing a local startup or a large-scale enterprise, social media is the bridge that connects your brand to your audience. It is more than just posting—it is about sharing valuable, engaging, and meaningful content that resonates with your customers. A well-executed social media strategy helps you boost brand awareness, build trust, enhance your online visibility, and make your business more memorable in a competitive digital landscape. Social media isn it just an option; it is the foundation for building lasting connections with your audience.
servisespage.text2: We believe that the best way to create successful marketing campaigns is to work closely with our clients to understand their goals and challenges.
servisespage.text4: Our white-label technology consulting company has become one of the most sought-after Custom Web Development Services in a very short period. It is famous for its unique techniques and practical results.

Creating_and_documenting_platforms_desc: We help you create and manage social media platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, and Pinterest, as well as social media apps like TikTok, YouTube, and Snapchat.
Recover_closed_accounts_desc: We help you recover closed accounts, reactivate deactivated accounts, and restore deleted accounts.
Create_sponsored_ads_desc: We help you create sponsored ads on platforms like Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and Google My Business, as well as on social media apps like TikTok, YouTube, and Snapchat.
platforms_management_desc: A service for creating and managing all platforms for independent artists, protecting content ownership, and securing their earnings through a monthly or yearly subscription with the company.

policy.title: CloudWav Production Policy
policy.intro: Welcome to CloudWav Production, a company specializing in music, professional services, advertising, brokerage, artificial intelligence, fashion, sales through other platforms, social media services, programming, artistic and visual production, contracting, partnerships, and other diverse services. We provide integrated solutions that support creators, artists, and content makers while ensuring digital rights protection and offering advanced promotional opportunities.

sections.title: 1. About Our Services
content: Producing and distributing music digitally on more than 200 global platforms.
A song platform that allows artists to share their work with the public.
Artist shout-outs, where customers can request promotional or greeting videos from artists.
Booking artists for events and advertising through a dedicated system within the platform.
Managing and executing digital advertising campaigns.
Mediating between brands and artists to facilitate collaborations.
Using AI to analyze data and deliver effective marketing strategies.
Producing professional-level music videos and visual ads.
Designing and developing websites and custom apps for creatives and businesses.
Managing contracts with artists and creatives to protect the rights of all parties.
Paid partnerships between individuals and companies to create new digital job opportunities.
Platform management service to protect content during the subscription period.
Ability to submit a request for full content protection based on agreement with the company.

sections.title: 2. Artist Registration
content: Registration is open to all artists without classifications (e.g., rising or famous artist).
You must provide accurate personal data, including a valid ID for identity verification.
The company has the right to reject any registration request that does not meet the required conditions.
The artist grants CloudWav Production the digital broadcasting rights only for the songs uploaded to the platform, while retaining full intellectual property rights.

sections.title: 3. Data We Collect
content: Personal information: name, email, phone number, account data.
Payment info: when subscribing to paid services (we do not store card data directly).
Usage data: such as pages you visit, device type, approximate location.
Cookies: We currently do not use them.

sections.title: 4. How We Use Your Data
content: To provide services such as music publishing, content management, and digital promotion.
To improve user experience by analyzing behavior and developing the platform and services.
Advertising and marketing by showing you content based on your interests.
Security and rights protection by detecting suspicious activity and preventing fraud.

sections.title: 5. Digital Rights & Content Protection
content: All artistic and musical works published through our platform are protected by intellectual property rights.
We use advanced technologies to prevent piracy and violations, offering solutions for digital content protection.
Artists can subscribe to platform management or request the company for full content protection.

sections.title: 6. Paid Ads & Partnerships
content: We show targeted ads but do not share your data with third parties without your consent.
Paid partnerships are available for companies and individuals interested in collaborating with creators and artists.
All financial dealings related to partnerships are conducted through formal contracts to ensure transparency and rights.

sections.title: 7. Your Rights as a User
content: You can request access to your personal data.
Correct any inaccurate information.
Request deletion of your data in some cases.
Unsubscribe from newsletters and targeted ads.
To contact us about your data, email: support@cloudwavproduction.com

sections.title: 8. Data Protection & Security
content: We use the latest security technologies to protect user data from breaches or violations.
All payment transactions are handled by secure providers, and we do not store card data.
We do not share your data with any third party without your permission, except in legal cases or to protect our rights.

sections.title: 9. Changes to the Policy
content: This policy may be updated occasionally, and users will be notified of any major changes.
Continued use of our services means you accept the new policy after updates.

sections.title: 10. Contact Us
content: CloudWav Production – All rights reserved
Support email: support@cloudwavproduction.com
General contact: contact@cloudwavproduction.com
Official website: cloudwavproduction.com
Thank you for choosing CloudWav Production. We are here to support your creativity, protect your work, and help you succeed through advanced technology.

policyUpdates.title: 8. Policy Updates
policyUpdates.content: This policy may be updated from time to time, and users will be notified of significant changes. Continued use of our services means acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
content: CloudWav Production – All rights reserved.
Support Email: support@cloudwavproduction.com
General Inquiries: contact@cloudwavproduction.com
Official Website: cloudwavproduction.com

policy.footer: Thank you for choosing CloudWav Production, we are here to support your creativity.

termsOfUse.title: Terms and Conditions of CloudWav Production

sections.title: 1. Introduction
content: Welcome to CloudWav Production, a company specializing in professional services including music, artistic and visual production, advertising, mediation, artificial intelligence, clothing, selling on other platforms, social media services, programming, contracts, and partnerships.
Our platform is a comprehensive solution for supporting creators, artists, and content makers, ensuring digital rights protection and offering advanced promotional and marketing opportunities.
By using the site and its services, you fully agree to these terms and conditions. Please read them carefully before proceeding.

sections.title: 2. General Registration (User Registration)
content: Registration is available to all users wishing to browse the site and access public content without needing identity verification.
The user must provide accurate and complete data to ensure a quality experience on the site.
CloudWav Production reserves the right to reject or suspend user accounts if false or non-compliant information is provided.

sections.title: 3. Artist Registration on the Platform
content: Artist registration is available to all artists through the site, and requires accurate and complete personal information, along with an official identity document.
CloudWav Production reserves the right to reject or suspend any registration that does not meet the required conditions.
Registering as an artist on the platform grants the right to digitally broadcast uploaded works, while the artist remains the legal owner of all their content.
The artist has the right to modify or update their profile and musical content at any time.

sections.title: 4. Contracting with Artists within the Company
content: The company offers the option to contract with artists as official partners to provide exceptional production and promotion services.
Full personal information and an official identity document are required for contracting.
Contract requests are reviewed by CloudWav Production's management, and contracts are executed based on separate agreements defining the rights and responsibilities of both parties.

sections.title: 5. Artist Registration on the Video Platform
content: Registration on the video platform is for artists offering services such as promotional videos and personalized video greetings.
The artist must provide accurate personal data and official identity verification.
Registering on the video platform grants the artist the right to receive video requests from clients, with pricing set at their discretion.
After the client confirms and pays for the request, the artist receives 70% of the amount, while CloudWav Production retains 30%.

sections.title: 6. Data We Collect
content: Personal information (e.g., name, email, phone number, account data).
Payment information when subscribing to paid services (without storing card data directly).
Usage data such as visited pages, device type, and approximate geographical location.
Cookies are not currently used.
All data is handled with strict confidentiality according to the company's privacy policy.

sections.title: 7. How We Use the Data
content: Data is used to provide services such as content publishing, management, and user behavior analysis to improve the site experience.
Used in advertising and marketing to display personalized content based on user interests.
Used to ensure security and detect suspicious activity to prevent fraud.

sections.title: 8. Digital Rights and Content Protection
content: All digital rights of uploaded content remain the property of the artist; artist registration only grants CloudWav Production the right to digitally broadcast the uploaded works.
Advanced technologies are used to prevent piracy and violations, and digital content protection services are available.
Artists can subscribe to a platform management service or request full protection based on agreements.

sections.title: 9. Advertising and Additional Services Policy
content: Site services are provided under the full scope of CloudWav Production's services without internal ads for subscribers.
Artists can request additional marketing services to promote their content via paid ad campaigns or customized promotional strategies.
All advertising and marketing agreements are formalized through official contracts ensuring transparency and rights protection.

sections.title: 10. Payments and Refund Policy
content: All payments made through the site are final and non-refundable after accepting the service's specific terms and conditions.
CloudWav Production is not responsible for refunds after order confirmation, except in the following cases:
If the requested service is unavailable or not delivered due to a technical or administrative error.
In special humanitarian cases evaluated by the company's management.
Payments are processed through secure systems without storing card information.

sections.title: 11. Data Protection and Privacy
content: CloudWav Production is committed to protecting all personal data and not sharing it with third parties unless with explicit consent or a legal request.
The artist has the right to request full deletion of their data upon account or service cancellation.

sections.title: 12. Account or Service Cancellation
content: The artist can request to cancel their account or service at any time with prior notice to the company.
CloudWav Production is not obligated to restore the account or service after cancellation and may retain some data for legal or administrative purposes.

sections.title: 13. Modification of Terms and Conditions
content: CloudWav Production reserves the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time without prior notice.
Continued use of the account or service after any modifications constitutes full acceptance of the new terms.

sections.title: 14. Contact and Technical Support
content: Users can contact the support team to resolve any account or service-related issues.
Support is available via email or the contact form on the website.

sections.title: 15. Additional Security Notes
content: Users must provide accurate data to ensure service quality.
CloudWav Production is not responsible for any penalties imposed by streaming platforms due to violations.
If a technical issue arises, the user must contact support immediately.

sections.title: 16. Legal Warning
content: Any violation of these terms may result in account or service suspension or cancellation without notice.
CloudWav Production reserves the right to take legal action against users involved in fraudulent or illegal activities.

sections.title: 17. Contact Us
content: CloudWav Production – All rights reserved.
Support email: support@cloudwavproduction.com
General contact: contact@cloudwavproduction.com
Official website: cloudwavproduction.com

platform_description_1: Our platform helps singers create profiles, share
platform_description_2: their songs, and connect with fans worldwide to
headerdescription: We provide everything you need to create your song from start to finish. Whether you're an emerging artist or a professional, our services are designed to help you present your best self with the highest quality.

feature1.title: Professional Voice Recording
feature1.description: Record your voice in a studio equipped with the latest technology, with a sound engineer to ensure clarity and high quality.

feature2.title: Song Lyrics Writing
feature2.description: We help you write lyrics that express you, match your style, and deliver your message.

feature3.title: Music Production & Arrangement
feature3.description: Original music and professional arrangement by experienced producers and musicians, across various styles and genres.

feature4.title: Professional Music Video Shooting
feature4.description: Shoot a high-quality music video with a specialized directing and filming team, including lighting, editing, and visual effects.

feature5.title: Complete Song Creation
feature5.description: From lyrics and composition to recording, arrangement, and mastering—we deliver a fully finished, publish-ready song.

feature6.title: Full Song & Music Video Package
feature6.description: A complete package including song production and high-quality video clip, with full coordination between all project elements.
